name: Galarian Moltres
author: KEIICHIRO ITO
flavor_text: The sinister aura that blazes like molten fire around this Pokémon is what inspired the name Moltres.

abilities.name: Malevolent Charge
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may attach up to 2 {D} Energy cards from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fiery Wrath
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.
